solution_line_template: First find the total number of cranberries harvested by humans: {total_cranberries} cranberries * {human_harvest_percent_num}% = <<{total_cranberries}*{human_harvest_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={human_harvested_cranberries}>>{human_harvested_cranberries}

Then subtract the number of cranberries taken by the humans and elk to find the number remaining: {total_cranberries} cranberries - {human_harvested_cranberries} cranberries - {elk_eaten_cranberries} cranberries = <<{total_cranberries}-{human_harvested_cranberries}-{elk_eaten_cranberries}={remaining_cranberries}>>{remaining_cranberries} cranberries
